nodes.id: 中国人民武装警察部队浙江省总队

zh-cn: 中国人民武装警察部队浙江省总队

description.zh-cn: 中国人民武装警察部队的省级总队，是副军级单位，隶属于武警总部。其主要执行治安维持、民防警卫、处突维稳等任务。
description.en: A provincial corps of the People's Armed Police, it is a deputy corps-level unit subordinate to the PAP Headquarters. Its main tasks include maintaining public order, civil defense, and stability maintenance.

nodes.id: 中国人民武装警察部队

zh-cn: 中国人民武装警察部队

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家武装力量的组成部分，负责国家内部安全保卫任务。
description.en: A component of the armed forces of the People's Republic of China, responsible for internal security and safeguarding.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民武装警察部队浙江省总队司令员，武警大校警衔。
description.en: Commander of the People's Armed Police Zhejiang Provincial Corps, holding the rank of PAP Senior Colonel.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民武装警察部队浙江省总队政治委员，武警大校警衔。
description.en: Political Commissar of the People's Armed Police Zhejiang Provincial Corps, holding the rank of PAP Senior Colonel.

en: Zhejiang Provincial Department of Public Security

description.zh-cn: 浙江省人民政府下设主管全省公安工作的职能部门。
description.en: The functional department of the Zhejiang Provincial People's Government responsible for public security work throughout the province.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国中央军事委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央军事委员会
en: Central Military Commission of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家军事领导机关。
description.en: The highest national military leading organ of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 国务院、中央军委关于调整中国人民武装警察部队领导管理体制的决定

zh-cn: 国务院、中央军委关于调整中国人民武装警察部队领导管理体制的决定

description.zh-cn: 1995年由中华人民共和国国务院和中央军事委员会发布的，关于调整武警部队领导管理体制的决定文件。
description.en: A decision document issued in 1995 by the State Council and the Central Military Commission of the People's Republic of China on adjusting the leadership and management system of the People's Armed Police.

nodes.id: 关于中国人民武装警察部队改革期间暂时调整适用相关法律规定的决定

zh-cn: 关于中国人民武装警察部队改革期间暂时调整适用相关法律规定的决定

description.zh-cn: 2017年通过的关于武警部队改革期间领导指挥体制调整的法律决定。
description.en: A legal decision passed in 2017 regarding the adjustment of the leadership and command system of the People's Armed Police during its reform period.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国浙江省的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level state administrative organ of Zhejiang Province, People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中国人民武装警察部队浙江省总队

description.zh-cn: 担任中国人民武装警察部队浙江省总队司令员。
description.en: Serves as the Commander of the People's Armed Police Zhejiang Provincial Corps.

relationships.target: 中国人民武装警察部队浙江省总队

description.zh-cn: 担任中国人民武装警察部队浙江省总队政治委员。
description.en: Serves as the Political Commissar of the People's Armed Police Zhejiang Provincial Corps.

relationships.source: 中国人民武装警察部队浙江省总队
relationships.target: 中国人民武装警察部队

description.zh-cn: 自1983年2月起隶属于武警总部。2017年改革后，改为直接受武警总部领导。
description.en: Subordinate to the PAP Headquarters since February 1983. After the 2017 reform, it was placed under the direct leadership of the PAP Headquarters.

relationships.source: 中国人民武装警察部队浙江省总队

description.zh-cn: 1983年至2017年间，武警浙江省总队同时隶属于浙江省公安厅建制。
description.en: Between 1983 and 2017, the PAP Zhejiang Provincial Corps was also subordinate to the Zhejiang Provincial Department of Public Security.

relationships.source: 中国人民武装警察部队浙江省总队

description.zh-cn: 在2017年改革前，武警浙江省总队接受武警总部和浙江省人民政府的双重领导。
description.en: Before the 2017 reform, the PAP Zhejiang Provincial Corps was under the dual leadership of the PAP Headquarters and the Zhejiang Provincial People's Government.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院
relationships.target: 国务院、中央军委关于调整中国人民武装警察部队领导管理体制的决定

description.zh-cn: 与中央军委联合发布《国务院、中央军委关于调整中国人民武装警察部队领导管理体制的决定》。
description.en: Jointly issued the 'Decision of the State Council and the Central Military Commission on Adjusting the Leadership and Management System of the Chinese People's Armed Police Force' with the Central Military Commission.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国中央军事委员会
relationships.target: 国务院、中央军委关于调整中国人民武装警察部队领导管理体制的决定

description.zh-cn: 与国务院联合发布《国务院、中央军委关于调整中国人民武装警察部队领导管理体制的决定》。
description.en: Jointly issued the 'Decision of the State Council and the Central Military Commission on Adjusting the Leadership and Management System of the Chinese People's Armed Police Force' with the State Council.

relationships.source: 国务院、中央军委关于调整中国人民武装警察部队领导管理体制的决定
relationships.target: 中国人民武装警察部队浙江省总队

description.zh-cn: 该决定将中国人民武装警察部队浙江省总队升级为副军级单位。
description.en: This decision upgraded the People's Armed Police Zhejiang Provincial Corps to a deputy corps-level unit.

relationships.source: 关于中国人民武装警察部队改革期间暂时调整适用相关法律规定的决定
relationships.target: 中国人民武装警察部队浙江省总队

description.zh-cn: 该决定调整了武警浙江省总队的领导管理体制，使其不再接受浙江省人民政府的双重领导，改为直接受武警总部领导。
description.en: This decision adjusted the leadership and management system of the PAP Zhejiang Provincial Corps, removing it from the dual leadership of the Zhejiang Provincial People's Government and placing it under the direct leadership of the PAP Headquarters.
